thread.title: Calvin Harris Responds to Happy Ending Rumors, Threatens Lawsuits for Defamation
thread.title_full: Calvin Harris Responds to Happy Ending Rumors, Threatens Lawsuits for Defamation - newsR

author: newsr.in
title: Calvin Harris Responds to Happy Ending Rumors, Threatens Lawsuits for Defamation
text: Calvin Harris is responding to rumors that he got a “happy ending” at a Thai massage parlor and he is threatening to sue for defamation over the lies. There are reports spreading that the 31-year-old entertainer and his girlfriend Taylor Swift have broken up over the rumors, though the singer’s pal Selena Gomez has put [...] »
